title: League wont fucking open
body:
I CLICK THE %%%% THE LOGO JUST SITS THERE FOR A WHILE AND DISAPPEARS AND NOTHING FUCKING HAPPENS,
AND I HAVE TRIED FUCKING EVERYTHING
REINSTALLED
RESTARTED
COMPATIBILITY
DELETING THE STUPID FUCKING FOLDERS
NOTHING WILL FUCKING WORK

replies.body: aight im having same problem, I have tried everything and deleting thos fucking folders does jack shit I don't have avast I fukn deleted all the anti viruses and nothing I have read hundreds of these and nothing works wtf is going on

Avast is blocking it for some reason (if you use it)
solution here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/n0ZyPFxd-solution-cant-log-in-avast-may-be-blocking-league
this happens to me as well, it is because of avast antivirus
